name: Ricky + Level Editor
description:
Ricky + Level Editor
Features:

√ You can create your own level!! with enemies, powerups and items at your leisure in game!!!!!

√ Share your levels with friends via WiFi or Bluetooth
√ Share your levels with the world via Internet
√ Naturally download levels from internet , features :
------> Name Level , Publisher , User's Picture on Twitter,tot Downloads, 5 start Rating, tot. ratings . sorted into 3 sections : top rated, top downloads, release date .

√ Radio Streaming
√ iPod playlist

Video : http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XWTSpveRWWo

You can follow FBS Software on Twitter!
http://twitter.com/FBSSoftware


Top 1 Arcade : Japan (January)
Top 3 Adventure : Japan (January)
Top 1 Adventure : USA (July)
Top 5 Arcade : USA (July)

11 Dicember 2009 Ricky 2: Free Update .

02/01/2010 update with other 2 new types of controls and difficulties decreased in the early levels.


Completely new.

Features:

New levels
New abilities
Powerups
Lives
Ceckpoint
new enemies with new abilities
bosses with new abilities
And more...

FBS Software presents

Help Ricky to find his brother Parry in more than 20 levels and 4 bosses in 4 Worlds .




It all began with the birth of the first child to the family of "Peet."
The night of his birth, the young “Parry” was abducted by a "boos,"
never to be heard of since .
He were looking for a couple to use the body to increase its powers.

The family had no choice but to proceed with their lives,
as rescuing young Parry was out of the question.
Soon, they decided to have another child,
and in time, the little "Ricky" was born.

When Ricky came of age, his parents told him the sad story of the
fate of his lost brother Parry.
"Ricky" often thought of this brother, whom he never knew,
and one day decided to head out on a quest to find him .
